DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety two week treatment DNK333 patient COPD cough .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy DNK333 Patients With COPD Cough
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate COPD Forced expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) â‰¥30 % predict FEV1/FVC ( force vital capacity ) < 70 % Significant amount cough minimal amount sputum production , judge self report Exclusion criterion : Upper low airway infection within 4 week prior screen COPD exacerbation within 4 week prior screen Past history current diagnosis congestive heart failure , cirrhosis hepatic failure History lung cancer pulmonary resection/thoracic radiotherapy Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
